Settings.Name: Enable Mod
Settings.Description: Toggle the mod on/off without uninstalling it

Settings.Name: Swarm Mode
Settings.Description: If checked, your party will take their turns together in turn-based mode, and then all enemies will act simultaneously as a single 'swarm', using Brawl's real-time combat engine.

Settings.Name: Enable Companion AI
Settings.Description: Toggle the companion AI on or off

Settings.Name: Enable Leaderboard
Settings.Description: If enabled, you can display a pop-up window containing some statistics for the current fight (in Swarm Mode) or for the session (Real-Time). Press LCtrl+V (default keybinding) to show the window.

Settings.Name: Fully Automated Brawls
Settings.Description: If checked, the companion AI will control ALL player characters, including the active character.

Settings.Name: Active Character Archetype
Settings.Description: Combat archetype for your currently selected character

Settings.Name: Companion Tactics
Settings.Description: High-level behavior for the companion AI.  Offense: prioritize killing enemies even if it means charging off by yourself.  Balanced: engage enemies that are within MAX_DISTANCE meters of the nearest party member; once engaged, try to stay on the target.  Defense: prioritize party cohesion; only engage enemies that are within MAX_DISTANCE meters of the player; disengage if the enemy moves farther away.  MAX_DISTANCE is set in the next setting.

Settings.Name: Defensive Tactics - Max Distance
Settings.Description: If Companion Tactics is set to 'Balanced' or 'Defense', AI-controlled party members will only engage enemies that are within this distance of the nearest party member or the player, respectively

Settings.Name: Companion AI Maximum Allowed Spell Level
Settings.Description: The companion AI will use spells only of this spell level or lower (for example, if set to 3, the AI will use spells of levels 1, 2, and 3).  If set to 0 (the default), the AI will only use cantrips and will not deplete your spell slots.

Settings.Name: Hitpoints Multiplier
Settings.Description: Increase or decrease the health of all units (players and enemies) by this factor, e.g. a value of 3 will triple all health values.

Settings.Name: Max Party Size
Settings.Description: The maximum number of characters allowed in your party.

Settings.Name: True Pause
Settings.Description: If checked, your characters will queue up actions during pause, and fire them when unpaused, similar to how combat worked in Baldur's Gate 1 and 2.

Settings.Name: Automatic Pause On Downed
Settings.Description: If checked, the game will automatically pause when the character the player is controlling goes down

Settings.Name: Automatic Pause On Combat Start
Settings.Description: If checked, the game will automatically pause when combat starts

Settings.Name: AI Turn Length
Settings.Description: The AI's turn length, in seconds, before adjusting for initiative.  The default is 6.0, meaning the AI will act once every 6 seconds.  Lower values make combat feel more frenetic, higher values make combat feel more relaxed.  (Note: values below 3 are not recommended and may cause strange behavior.)

Settings.Name: Initiative Die
Settings.Description: How many sides the initiative die has.  By default it is a d20.  Higher values make initiative more random, lower values make initiative more deterministic.  In real-time combat, a unit's turn length is rescaled by its initiatve roll, up to +/- 30%.  Turn lengths can never drop below 1 second.

Settings.Name: Hogwild Mode
Settings.Description: If checked, the AI will go hogwild, freely using any of their spells/abilities with zero resource costs.

Settings.Name: No Freeze On Bonus Actions During Pause
Settings.Description: If checked, bonus actions will not freeze your character during True Pause in Real-Time Mode.

Settings.Name: Players Go First
Settings.Description: If checked, players will always go first in the turn order for Swarm Mode.

Settings.Name: Enemy Turn Time Limit (Seconds)
Settings.Description: Global time limit for each enemy group during their swarm turn.  Once this time limit is reached, the enemy group's turn will end, regardless of whether they have used all their resources or not.  (Default: 15 seconds)

Settings.Name: Enemy Swarm Group Size
Settings.Description: The maximum number of enemies that can act at the same time.  Users with less powerful computers may need to decrease this value.  The default value is 20.  Warning: values above 30 may cause the game to slow or crash during large encounters!

Settings.Name: Automatically Trigger Swarm Mode Companion AI
Settings.Description: If checked, and Companion AI is enabled, your companions will automatically act using Brawl's AI at the beginning of your team's turn.  If not checked, the companion AI can be triggered using the Queue Companion AI Action hotkey (LCtrl+C by default).

Settings.Name: Exclude Enemy Tiers (Trials of Tav)
Settings.Description: If set, Trials of Tav enemies at or above this tier will be excluded from the Swarm AI's control.  This setting has no effect outside of Trials of Tav.

Settings.Name: Mod Toggle Hotkey
Settings.Description: Hotkey for toggling the mod on/off

Settings.Name: Companion AI Toggle Hotkey
Settings.Description: Hotkey for toggling the companion AI on/off

Settings.Name: On Me Hotkey
Settings.Description: Hotkey to instruct your companions to come to you

Settings.Name: Attack My Target Hotkey
Settings.Description: Hotkey to instruct your companions to attack your most recent target

Settings.Name: Attack-Move Hotkey
Settings.Description: Hotkey to instruct your companions to move to a position (and attack, if an enemy is at this position)

Settings.Name: Request Heal Hotkey
Settings.Description: Hotkey to instruct your companions to heal

Settings.Name: Change Tactics Hotkey
Settings.Description: Hotkey to change your companions AI tactics setting

Settings.Name: Companion AI Action Hotkey
Settings.Description: Hotkey to allow the Companion AI to select your companions' next actions.  This hotkey is usable in Real-Time Mode during true pause, or during the player's turn in Swarm Mode.

Settings.Name: Fully Automated Brawls Toggle Hotkey
Settings.Description: Hotkey for toggling Full Auto on and off

Settings.Name: Pause Toggle Hotkey
Settings.Description: Hotkey for pause/unpause

Settings.Name: Leaderboard Toggle Hotkey
Settings.Description: Hotkey to display the leaderboard

Settings.Name: Mod Toggle Hotkey 2 (Optional)
Settings.Description: If hotkey 2 is set, both buttons must be pressed together.  Leave hotkey 2 blank to just use a single controller button.

Settings.Name: Override
Settings.Description: If checked, override this button's default functionality.
